Product_Name: Universal Remote Control Compatible for Samsung Smart-TV LCD LED UHD QLED 4K HDR TV Remote, with Netflix and Prime Video Buttons
AI_Text: Customers like the ease of use of the remote control. They say it has no learning curve and no programming is needed. They are also satisfied with the value. However, some customers have reported issues with the quality and buttons. They mention that the buttons are hard to press and make a clicking noise. They also dislike the volume control. Opinions are mixed on performance and remote control, but overall, it's a good product.
Description: Compatible with all for Samsung series TV Including 2024 year, 2023 year, 2022 year, 2021 year, 2020 year, 2019 year, 2018 year, 2017 year series TV Remote
